summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows an in-game interaction menu with a character named "Xu Dog" in a video game. Xu Dog appears as a humanoid creature with animalistic features, wearing a robe and standing in a dimly lit environment resembling a cave or dungeon. The menu options include "Make Medicines," "Remake Celestial Medicines," "Store," and "Leave." A highlighted item, "Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet," is displayed as a key item. Text at the bottom reads, "Be it celestial or mortal, all medicines can be made here," and "Regret not, for his power endures. His desire be but one more pill, gladly bestowed by me."
